entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story, a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is mentioned throughout the text as the one who is being spoken to by others.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: A student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, mentioned as someone who may have brought a dangerous object into the school. He is not physically present in the scene but is being discussed by others.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Harry's friend and classmate at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is mentioned as someone who is sitting with his arms folded and staring over at Lavender Brown.

entities.name: lavender brown
entities.description: A student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, mentioned as the one Ron is staring at.

entities.name: slughorn
entities.description: A professor at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, mentioned as someone who invited Harry and Hermione to his party.

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Harry's friend and classmate at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. She is mentioned as someone who was invited to Professor Slughorn's party.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: A professor at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, mentioned as the one who sent a message to Harry through Demelza Robins.

entities.name: demelza robins
entities.description: The new Chaser, mentioned as someone who appeared suddenly at Harry's shoulder with a message from Professor Snape.

relationships.description: Harry is suspected of having a connection to Malfoy, as he is being asked if he knows how Malfoy could have brought a dangerous object into the school.
Harry was invited to Professor Slughorn's party, as mentioned by Harry himself.
Professor Snape sent a message to Harry through Demelza Robins, asking him to come to his office at half past eight.
Ron was staring over at Lavender Brown.
Harry and Hermione were both invited to Professor Slughorn's party, as mentioned by Harry himself.
Professor Snape sent a message to Harry through Demelza Robins.
